home.title: Hi! I'm Frank ‚ú®
home.description: I'm posting music marketing ideas and guides to both keep my own creative muscles well-excercised, and to share with anyone who might get use from them. As someone who has worked with artists of various genres in roles ranging from content planning and creation to estlabishing specific album promotion strategy, my favourite aspect of it all is always when I could find a unique spin towards achieving an artists marketing goal with tools and techniques they may not have thought of.
